package.name: zeroconf
package.summary: A PHP interface for browsing network services using ZeroConf
package.description: Provides an interface for browsing and publishing network services via ZeroConf using the Howl library. You can browse the network for specific services like database servers (PostgreSQL, Sybase, InterBase), Apple File Sharing, web services via Apache's mod_rendezvous, etc. and discover the IP address and port for each found service.

release.notes: Initial package release. Browsing services is functional.
